document_data.name: Galarth Ultashund
document_data.mainbody: '''Galarth Ultashund''', known as '''"Wizardkiller"''', was a [[cleric]] of [[Cyric]] in [[Luskan]] on the [[Sword Coast North]] and a member of the [[Arcane Brotherhood]] in the 1360s [[DR]]. He was known to have [[psionic]] powers.
document_data.Activities: Circa [[1365 DR]], Galarth's duty was to eliminate any members of the Brotherhood who got too far out of line. He commanded at least seven assassins, who included skilled thieves and two or more [[doppelganger]]s .
document_data.Relationships: Galarth worked under the direct orders of the Archmage Arcane, [[Queltar Thaeloon]].
